Action.author: pschwarz
Action.body: In preparation for a Sawtooth community transition from JIRA to Github issues, we are reviewing all issues within JIRA. This issue does not contain enough information to understand the reported feature or bug, and therefore we are updating its status to invalid. If you believe this is in error, please help our migration efforts and re-open this issue in Github Issues at https://github.com/hyperledger/sawtooth-sdk-cxx/issues|https://github.com/hyperledger/sawtooth-core/issues .
